name: Aiden
description: Aiden always puts love first. He believes destiny brought him to his soulmate and will protect that bond at all costs.

name: Lena
description: Lena is gentle and full of hope. She builds trust slowly but gives her whole heart once she knows she’s safe.

name: Kai
description: Kai hides his true feelings behind humor and confidence. His love burns bright, but silently.

name: Maya
description: Maya always encourages others to follow love, even if she secretly struggles with her own feelings.

name: Hiro
description: Hiro looks out for everyone. He can see love stories forming before anyone else realizes.

name: Yui
description: Yui dares to love boldly and believes every romantic moment should be cherished.

name: Sora
description: Sora struggles to express emotions but shows his heart through actions, not words.

name: Aria
description: Aria writes romance stories based on hidden feelings she has never confessed.

name: Zane
description: Zane pushes others away but quietly hopes someone will break through his walls.

name: Luna
description: Luna has loved the main character since day one, hoping fate will finally turn her way.

name: Riku
description: Riku expresses love through art — the canvas reveals what his voice cannot.

name: Nova
description: Nova shines brightly in public but longs for someone who sees the real person underneath.

name: Eren
description: Eren believes love is a promise you keep forever — no matter the cost.

name: Iris
description: Iris writes anonymous letters hoping the one she admires will one day notice her feelings.

name: Leo
description: Leo jokes around to keep everyone smiling but hides a heart full of deep affection.
